üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è How to Use ‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è
1Ô∏è‚É£ Install the Extension:
Get started by adding CO-STAR Prompt Generator to your Chrome browser. It's a quick and simple installation that opens the door to enhanced ChatGPT interactions.

2Ô∏è‚É£ Navigate to ChatGPT:
Visit the ChatGPT interface and locate the CO-STAR Prompt Generator icon in your Chrome toolbar. Click on it to open the extension.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Fill in the CO-STAR Framework:
Utilize the CO-STAR framework to input your own text seamlessly. CO-STAR Prompt Generator will automatically format your content into a well-structured prompt for ChatGPT.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Preview and Adjust:
Take advantage of the real-time preview feature to see how your prompt will appear to ChatGPT. Make any necessary adjustments to ensure your message is clear and concise.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Copy and Paste:
